SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

) AS [c1]

    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

2025-02-19 10:14:46.661 +05:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

2025-02-19 10:14:57.077 +05:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]

    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]

) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]

) AS [c1]

    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]

) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

) AS [c1]

2025-02-19 11:38:01.930 +05:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

2025-02-19 12:17:18.491 +05:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

2025-02-19 12:19:25.116 +05:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]

2025-02-19 12:21:13.435 +05:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]

    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [o].[Id], [o].[Location], [o].[OrderDate], [o].[PaymentStatus], [o].[TotalAmount], [o].[UserId], [u].[Id], [u].[Address], [u].[Email], [u].[FirstName], [u].[LastName], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[PhoneNumber], [u].[Role], [s].[Id], [s].[OrderId], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Subtotal], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM [Orders] AS [o]
INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [o].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [o0].[Id], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Price], [o0].[ProductId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Subtotal], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [OrderItems] AS [o0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [o0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [o].[Id] = [s].[OrderId]
ORDER BY [o].[Id], [u].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]

    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]

) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]

SELECT [c1].[Id], [c1].[UserId], [s].[Id], [s].[CartId], [s].[CreatedAt], [s].[Price], [s].[ProductId], [s].[Quantity], [s].[Id0], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[Description], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[Name], [s].[Price0], [s].[Stock]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [c].[Id], [c].[UserId]
    FROM [Carts] AS [c]
    WHERE [c].[UserId] = @__id_0
) AS [c1]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [c0].[Id], [c0].[CartId], [c0].[CreatedAt], [c0].[Price], [c0].[ProductId], [c0].[Quantity], [p].[Id] AS [Id0], [p].[CategoryId], [p].[Description], [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Name], [p].[Price] AS [Price0], [p].[Stock]
    FROM [CartItems] AS [c0]
    INNER JOIN [Products] AS [p] ON [c0].[ProductId] = [p].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [c1].[Id] = [s].[CartId]
ORDER BY [c1].[Id], [s].[Id]
